name: Iwara Enhancement
description: Multiple UI enhancements for better experience.

auto.label: One-click Download
auto.desc: Automatically starts download when clicking the download button.

filename.label: Filename
filename.desc:
Filename template to use when downloading a video.
Each keyword should be surrounded by {'{ }'}.

key.title: video's title
key.author: author's name
key.date: date time when the download starts
key.up_date: date time when the video was uploaded

filename.replace_illegal_char: Replace characters that are disallowed in filename with:
tips: You can use "/" in the filename to create subfolders, for example {AUTHOR}/{DATE}-{TITLE}.
If the filename doesn't work, check if you have any browser extensions that may interfere with the download, such as the Aria2 extension.

warn_tm.desc: This feature requires Tampermonkey's download mode to be set to Browser API, please follow this guideâ†— and refresh the page once done.

like_rate.label: Like rate
like_rate.desc: Displays like rates in video/image lists.

highlight_threshold.label: Highlight threshold
highlight_threshold.desc: Highlights video/image items over certain like rate.

widen_content.label: Widen content
widen_content.desc: Widen the content area in video/image pages.
